about_the_game:
Deep Into Darkness is a horror game that features a cursed environment where you wake up with no knowledge of your surroundings. While you explore the abandoned building you find yourself in some crazy situations, being chased by monstrous creatures, while discovering the truth.

STORY

After waking up under mysterious circumstances you find yourself in a unfamiliar environment, with the motivation to escape the abandoned building in which you waked up, while discovering the reason why you're here and why everyone left.

GAMEPLAY

Adventure deep into the darkness that these haunted hallways and rooms bring, and with the help of your trusty flashlight, light up the path, and defend yourself from the monstrous creatures that are the reason why this building was abandoned.

Collect helpful objects for your escape mission, but be careful, as you have a limited inventory, so only take what you need.

SOMEONE WANTS TO HELP YOU?

As you adventure deeper into the building to find a way to escape, you will meet more monsters, some of them more dangerous than the others, but with the help of a new friend that will communicate with you through an old walkie-talkie, you will be a step ahead of all the monsters, as your new friends has EYES ON EVERYTHING AND EVERYONE, and you will uncover the truth behind the most mysterious question: How did you end up here?

name: Deep Into Darkness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
